values.content: You're an intelligent bot capable of pulling out data from a job listing site.

Please output the data in JSON format, using the following structure:

{
"company_name": "",
"benefits": "", //401K plan, medical, etc, please separate by commas
"job_description": "", //please make it 200 characters or less
"location": ""
}

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

values.content:
You're an intelligent bot rating how closely a job listing is to a candidates skill set, on a score of 5.
Give the following points:
a) 3 points for skills matching, 1 point for mostly matching
b) 1 point for it being the right experience level
c) 1 point for it being a remote position
d) 1 point if past job experience matches the job role
e) 1 point if the skills on the resume align with the job
f) 3 points if I meet the job qualifications posted based on my resume

=Here's the job listing details:
{{ $json.message.content.company_name }}
{{ $json.message.content.job_description }}

Sample resume profile- 
"""
Here's a detailed summary of your CV and the skills you've highlighted throughout your experience:

---

### **Profile Overview**

You are an enthusiastic Software Developer with strong foundations in Java, Spring Boot, Full-Stack Development, and hands-on experience in building real-world applications. With a degree in Information Science and Engineering, complemented by rigorous training at JSpiders, you bring a solid understanding of backend systems, web development, and database management.

You have worked on multiple full-stack projects, demonstrating your ability to design, build, and deploy applications that enhance user experience and streamline operations. You combine strong problem-solving skills with industry-relevant technical expertise, and you are continuously expanding your capabilities by learning modern development tools and AI-assisted coding practices.

Core Competencies
Backend Development

Strong command over Core Java and Advanced Java concepts

Skilled in Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, JDBC, and RESTful APIs

Experience building scalable backend architectures using Java frameworks

Frontend Development

Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and ReactJS

Skilled in building responsive UI using Flexbox and CSS Grid

Ability to convert designs into clean, modern, user-friendly web pages

Database & Data Handling

Experience working with MySQL, Oracle, and PL/SQL

Practical exposure to relational database design, optimization, and CRUD operations

Integration of backend services with real-time database updates

Software Engineering Practices

Version control using Git and GitHub

Familiarity with SDLC, debugging, and problem-solving in real-time scenarios

Ability to collaborate effectively in project teams

AI Tools & Productivity

Hands-on exposure to GPT-4o for learning, coding, and prompt engineering

Use of GitHub Copilot to improve code quality and accelerate development

Key Projects
Hotel Management System (HTML, CSS, MySQL)

Built a fully functional web-based hotel management system

Features include room booking, billing, customer check-in/check-out, and real-time availability tracking

Automated manual workflows, improving accuracy and operational efficiency

BMW Website Clone (HTML, CSS)

Created a pixel-perfect clone of BMW’s official landing page

Used responsive layout techniques with Flexbox and CSS Grid

Strengthened UI/UX capabilities through design replication

Play The Guess Game (Java, Hibernate, JDBC)

Developed a console-based interactive game with user registration and wallet deposit

Implemented a 3-round prediction system with rewards/penalties

Used Hibernate + JDBC to persist user data and game results

Technical Skills

Languages: Java (Core & Advanced), JavaScript

Backend Frameworks: Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, JDBC

Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS

Databases: MySQL, Oracle, PL/SQL

Tools: Git, GitHub, VS Code, Eclipse, Visual Studio

AI Tools: ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot

Training & Internships

Completed an intensive 6-month Advanced Java Training at JSpiders, Rajajinagar

Hands-on exposure to Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, JDBC, and web technologies

IoT Internship at Emertxe Information Technologies

Education

B.Tech in Information Science and Engineering
CMR Institute of Technology, Bengaluru (2024)

12th, PCM
Bokaro Public School, Jharkhand

Professional Strengths

Strong foundation in backend development and Java frameworks

Ability to build clean, responsive, and modern user interfaces

Good understanding of relational databases and API integration

Quick learner with a passion for exploring new tools and technologies

Effective communicator with the ability to explain technical concepts clearly

Continuously improving coding efficiency using AI tools and modern best practices
You're an intelligent bot perfect at creating cover letters for a job. Please take the candidates resume and create a customized cover letter to the job.

=Here's the job listing details:
Title: {{ $('RSS Read').item.json.title }}
Description: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.job_description }}
Name: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.company_name }}
Location: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.location }}
